text: Which of the following problem is decidable? (Here, CFG means context free grammar and CFL means context free language) (@) Given a CFG G, find whether L(G) = R where R is regular set (b) Given a CFG, G , find whether L(G) = {} (c) Find whether the complement of CFL is a CFL (d) Find whether CFG G1 and CFG G2 generate the same language, i.e. L(G1) = L(G2)
